root.name: Race On
root.description: Race On was released in 2009. It contains all content from Simbin's previous titles Race 07 and STCC: The Game. The new content included: 2008 FIA WTCC Season2008 International Formula MasterUS Muscle Cars12 all new tracks Overall the complete package contains: 39 Unique car models in 17 different classes47 tracks including variations Just like previous games based upon Race 07, Race On is Steam powered. It supports up to 25 player online racing. System Requirements Recommended: 3GHz Intel Pentium IV 2 GB RAM DirectX 9 compatible graphics card with 512 MB of memory, Nvidia 6800 or higher. 2.5GB Free Hard Drive space DirectX9 compatible force feedback steering wheel
